summary: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.
cast: Patrick Wayne|Taryn Power|Margaret Whiting|Jane Seymour|Patrick Troughton|Kurt Christian|Nadim Sawalha|Damien Thomas|Bruno Barnabe|Bernard Kay|Salami Coker|David Sterne|Pierre Mattocks|Peter Mayhew
keywords: saber toothed tiger|ship|cult favorite|turned into an animal|psychotronic film
title: Simbad y el ojo del tigre
